name: SpellBound (itch) (MetallicMoon)
description:
When demons invade her peaceful kingdom, a young sorceress in training is tasked by her master to bring the book containing all magic to safety. Along the way, she recruits Aabinus, one of the demonic soldiers, against his will to assist her in her duty. But Aabinus tells her things she never knew and Kati finds herself questioning her master's wisdom.

Caught in the midst of a war that will decide the fate of the world and alone with a demon, will Kati remain true to her convictions?

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

SpellBound is still in development and this is a short demo. A longer demo will be made available when it is completed.

Development can be followed at https://twitter.com/MetMoonGames
